org.apache.flink.storm.api

类 FlinkTopology

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.storm.api.FlinkTopology

  • public class FlinkTopology
extends java.lang.Object
    FlinkTopology translates a TopologyBuilder to a Flink program. CAUTION: StateSpouts are currently not supported.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createTopology

        public static FlinkTopology createTopology(org.apache.storm.topology.TopologyBuilder stormBuilder)
        Creates a Flink program that uses the specified spouts and bolts.
        参数:
        stormBuilder - The Storm topology builder to use for creating the Flink topology.
        返回:
        A FlinkTopology which contains the translated Storm topology and may be executed.

      • getExecutionEnvironment

        public StreamExecutionEnvironment getExecutionEnvironment()
        Returns the underlying Flink StreamExecutionEnvironment for the Storm topology.
        返回:
        The contextual environment (local or remote).

      • execute

        public JobExecutionResult execute()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Directly executes the Storm topology based on the current context (local when in IDE and remote when executed through ./bin/flink).
        返回:
        The Flink JobExecutionResult after the execution of the Storm topology.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - which occurs during execution of the translated Storm topology.
